title: Timucuan Ecological & Historic Preserve: Teacher Workshops
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education     Professional Development     Teacher Workshops                Teacher Workshops         Teachers documenting artifacts from this living room "site". NPS Photo  Teacher Workshops are offered every year at Kingsley Plantation. There educators are introduced to the entire Project Archaeology curriculum. They tour the site with a Ranger, participate in the hands-on lessons, and discuss ways to use and adapt Project Archaeology to meet their classroom goals. Resources: Upcoming Workshop Information Investigating a Tabby Slave Cabin- Student Notebook Investigating a Tabby Slave Cabin- Teacher Instructions Project Archaeology Florida Public Archaeology Network- Northeast Region
